effect.x_y: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is paralyzed, this move has double power, and the target is cured of its paralysis.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is paralyzed, this move has double power, and the target is cured of its paralysis.

short_effect.x_y: If the target is paralyzed, inflicts double damage and cures the paralysis.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: If the target is paralyzed, inflicts double damage and cures the paralysis.

flavor_text.x_y: This attack inflicts double damage on a target with paralysis. This also cures the target’s paralysis, however.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: This attack inflicts double damage on a target with paralysis. This also cures the target’s paralysis, however.
